entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Unknown switch" when trying to compile NativeAOT. #97006
  • OpenSslCachedSystemStoreProvider DER loading does not work #97001
    9.0.0
  • Array variance checks are not optimized away for types known to be not arrays #97000
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Loop alignment is computed incorrectly in some cases after `BBJ_NONE` removal #96998
    9.0.0
  • Large MacOS deployed size with NativeAOT including large __LINKEDIT file #96997
  • System.Text.Json ignores properties that override the setter only. #96996
    Future
  • StartTransportLayerSecurity(...) method throw an exception when using System.DirectoryServices.Protocols in version 8.0.0 on Linux #96988
  • Async/await tasks hold references to the intermediate results #96987
  • Call to gc_heap::create_bgc_thread hanging #96984
  • Nuget Update for CVE-2024-0057 #96981
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Numerics.Vectors, Version=4.1.3.0, or one of its dependencies. #96980
  • The DiagnosticsHelper.CompareTags method assumes that the list for the default meter factory create method is sorted, but the list is not sorted.” #96979
    Future
  • [RISC-V] Optimizing assemblies for size failed #96978
  • Exception when using None as method parameter of a python client with a .NET 8 COM server #96976
  • [API Proposal]: `SpinLockTakenScope` and `SpinLock.Take` #96975
  • [API Proposal]: System.ServiceModel.Syndication equivalent for SiteMap and SiteMapIndex files #96973
  • [Mono][RISCV] How can I Debugging Multi-thread problems of Mono #96971
  • Unable to profile Mac Catalyst apps with `dotnet trace` #96970
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsUserErrors.Test_BadEventSource_MismatchedIds_WithEtwListener #96968
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #96967
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricsTests.TestMeterCreationWithOptions #96966
  • Update code fix for SYSLIB1054 to use a collection expression #96964
    Future

Closed

  • [iOS/macOS] Time zone APIs don't reflect system time zone change #97010
  • Question regarding freshness of volatile reading of a value written with Interlocked #97007
  • [API Proposal]: AVX-512 Masking helper functions #96986
  • [Android][arm] Package net.dot.System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests could not be assigned a valid UID #96922
  • [API Proposal] Expose `System.String` static methods as string extensions #79020
    Future
  • [wasm] Failing test `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ManagedDelay_ContinueWith` #96493
  • `XmlNode.Prefix` should have `[AllowNull]` #96882
    Future
  • ExecutionEngineException in WinForms app (Paint.NET) on .NET 8 RC2, which does not occur in .NET 7 (GCStress) #94579
    9.0.0
  • iOS NativeAOT testing app failing to build in performance pipeline #96868
    9.0.0
  • Provide access to dynamically created instruments via DI #96305
    Future
  • Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration* tests failing in CI #48798
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator throws "CS0306: Type“ReadOnlySpan<byte> cannot be used as type argument" on certain class due to unknown reason #96540
  • [API Proposal]: Make Unsafe work with readonly byref values #69352
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Parse/format `Half`s from/to UTF-8. #75313
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: add direct buffer access to SocketAddress #78757
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Chunk (Array) #85653
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer to detect if method called twice #92018

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Allow jump-to-next-block removal for blocks with alignment #97011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix native AOT outerloop #97008
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold more always failing type checks #97005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Type test `List<T>` in Enumerable.SequenceEquals and forward to `MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqual(span...)` #97004
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Rewind the BIO before attempting to re-process as DER #97003
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Port loop compaction to new loop representation #96995
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] macOS: Set certificate as a dependency of private key handles #96993
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CY_3A and IF_SVE_CY_3B group #96992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove obsolete C++ name mangling #96983
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement getStaticFieldCurrentClass for NAOT #96982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization clean up the code #96974
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Don't shorten OCSP expriation on failed server OCSP fetch #96972
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update HP libunwind to v1.8.0 #96969
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] [iOS][tvOS] Fix building runtime tests on iOS-like platforms #96994
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.x
  • Simplify RuntimeType.SplitName #96991
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some outdated helpers in libraries/Common #95515
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add `[AllowNull]` to XmlNode.Prefix #96912
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [perf] Use HybridGlobalization as default and only option for Apple mobile platforms #96918
    tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #96951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • chore(ilc/mach-o): add workaround or fix for problem with dead_strip #96743
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono] [tests] Set error for mono_fullaot runtime tests when no suitable tests are found #96902
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96808
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • extend MemoryCache with `ICollection<object> Keys` property #94992
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Delete old DFS and dominator implementations #96927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #96018
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add note about docker in the testing doc (fix #95436) #95557
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/8.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96838
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Disable load/store vector APIs until Mono adds support for it #96944
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #96936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make startup hooks kind of work with native AOT #96894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix assertion at BigInteger.TryParse(null, out _) #96930
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log to Vector64/128/256/512 #96913
    area-System.Numerics
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Excel Addin Setup File - Could not load file or assembly 'System.Buffers, Version=4.0.2.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' #38019
  • Can't remove entries from SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion without removing _OR_GREATER defines #38016
  • malloc error during `dotnet restore`on MacOs #38014
  • [Regression] APICompat / PackageValidation runs without a runtime graph #38013
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • Question: State of C++/CLI with dotnet #37667
    Discussion
  • Use `packages.lock.json` instead of `project.assets.json`, if available #35556
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Add filtering to SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion validation. Fixes #38016. #38017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #38006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #37999
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Identify riscv64 as valid arch #37994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Install manifests for rollback after update --from-rollback-file #37965
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #37832
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • Ensure dotnet/aspnet base image can be inferred for ASP.Net applications #37996
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2353448 #37964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiler can't determine best common type for `switch` expression #71649

Closed

  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 when constructing an invalid implicitly type array of Func #71593
  • CSharpSyntaxNode.DeserializeFrom(stream) does not work #8676
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • IDE0051: Consider a record's private constructor as used #71650
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Preserve the whitespaces when rewriting an inheritdoc #71589
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • WIP: Make list a collection builder type #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to value-tasks in asset lookup #71360
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core Blazor Authorization Roles do not allow non-word characters #53398
  • Perf regression: caching, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53394
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #53393
  • Kestrel: callbacks for HTTP2 events(stream open, stream close, stream error, etc) #53387
  • The POST request does not specify which form is being submitted. #53382
  • Modify the Blazor Web App template #53381
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Permission Based Authorization In Blazor .Net 8 #53378
  • Kestrel: Ability to capture HTTP2 errors #53377
  • Blazor [.NET 6] DotNetStreamReference throws exception when arrayBuffer is not read in javascript with using keyword. #53376
  • Make `FormMappingValidator` public #53374
  • Expose the string prefix from Editor<T> so that other components can consume it (title updated to reflect context) #53373
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Error : Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild')) #53372
  • Exception raised from `Factory.CreateClient()` when type provided to `WebApplicationFactory<TEntryPoint>` is a subclass of `Program` #53370
  • Updated blazor server dotnet 7 to 8. builder.Services.AddCascadingAuthenticationState(); doesn't call GetAuthenticationStateAsync() after login. Old way <CascadingAuthenticationState> component does, but now causes UI flicker. #53369

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #53276
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53353
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, updates #53375
  • Buttons must have discernible text #52141
    8.0.x
  • When token expires the authenticationservice.js gets a new token but not with all of the same scopes as the original request #53296
  • HTTP OTEL metrics: use `error.type` instead of `exception.type` attribute #51029
  • what's different between use and not use await base.OnAfterRenderAsync #53357
  • Provide the ability to build static sites like Svelte, Hugo, or Gatsby #53365
  • Blazor SSR using Iframe is not working #53205
  • Loading static assets from wwwroot folder returns 404 not found in Blazor8 #53204
  • .NET 6/7 migration to .NET 8 with Docker container #53327

PullRequests

Created

  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Enable websocket compression for Blazor Server and Interactive Server components in Blazor web #53389
    area-blazor
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #53371
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] Add title to column options. Fixes #52141 #53304
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [main] Stop duplicating history with streaming-enhanced-form PRG. Fixes #51674 #53303
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53341
    area-blazor
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty and ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #52897
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access Denied (5) #4464

PullRequests

Updated

  • Counter instruments display absolute values now in dotnet-counters #4455

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PanUpdatedEventArgs should provide you with some way of get the current window-relative position of the pan gesture #19914
  • Network connection gets terminated on iOS when the app goes background #19913
  • [Proposal] Add a new public API to allow defining TypedBinding in code #19912
  • Map Control, adding large number of pins issue #19906
  • Make the HideSoftInputOnTappedChangedManager class public #19905
  • [Android] ResfreshView IsEnabled not working #19897
    Backlog
  • Error when building MAUI project in visual studio: WMC0001 Unknown type 'xxx' in XML namespace 'http://schemas.microsoft.com/dotnet/2021/maui' #19896
  • [iOS] UIBarButtonItem custom font #19895
  • "System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find System.Private.CoreLib.dll" in Release-mode MAUI application #19894
  • [MAUI]When you double-click a page on Android, you must return twice before you can return to the original page. #19893
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]For G2, pressing enter without entering any text can make the label turn green. #19892
    Backlog
  • Back button disabled second time FlyoutPage #19891
    Backlog
  • The parameter is incorrect. The parameter is incorrect. #19888
    Triaged

Closed

  • Font not found in Android, but works well in Windows. #19596
  • Not able to change NavigationBarDividerColor on android platform #19789
  • [macOS] [8.0] Hybrid app crashed after launch on macOS 12.4 #19904
  • [net7.0][iOS] TitleView contents appear partially above the top of the screen #14670
  • [Android] Button text alignment inconsistencies #14712
    Backlog
  • [iOS] error MAUI0000: System.MissingMethodException: Method not found #19899
  • Show output for Release applications on Android #6824
  • Xamarin Forms Namespace Caused Failure to Generate Code Behind and Compile ALL XAML Files #18637
  • [WinUI3] Cannot publish Windows MSIX when referencing class libraries and using Unit Test project workaround; #18818
  • Xaml hot reload not working on VS Mac Could not resolve type with token 01000062 from typeref (expected class 'System.AppDomain' #17615
  • "Codesign" exited with code 1 issue when try to build iOS app using visual studio 2022 for mac. #17612
  • Impossible to use MAUI win app outside of Visual Studio #15067
  • Visual Studio freezes with "Loading document..." message after saving XAML file #18069
  • When net8 app reference net7 project, breakpoint in net7 not work on Android #17564
  • After Visual Studio for MAC Update My App Crash On Launch on IOS #16362
  • VS 2022 Maui is does not give the option for the GoogleServiceJson build action #14486
  • hot reload #18018
  • MAUI Helloworld - NuGet packages restore process Error #18509
  • Can't create new projects - value cannot be null. (Parameter 'installation') #18833
  • Add cross-platform lifecycle events #19869
  • Shell is a biggest problem/bug in MAUI. #19887

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Developer Tools option setting for Blazor Hybrid Mac Catalyst view. #19909
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19907
  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    community ✨

Merged

  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    area/architecture, community ✨, stale
  • Fix Android MediaPicker Photo capture logic #19844
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #19898
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [xamlg] improve error for Xamarin.Forms namespace #19683
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Update README.md #19797
    area/docs 📓

Updated

  • [iOS] Set text color of unselected TabbedPage tabs #18777
    community ✨, stale
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Update MSBuild.StructuredLogger #19824
    community ✨
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • fix - 12469 - android refreshview isrefreshing binding #18273
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale
  • Resizetizer Regex Fix #19600
    area/single project ☝️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type '' when running Add-Migration in PMC #32837
  • EF Core creating a .config folder #32836
  • Migrations add doesn't work with Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #32835
  • How make a query with join and or condition? #32828
  • Raw SQL literal with GO on a new line of that literal fails when executing migration #32826
  • ExecuteDeleteAsync throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException when an owned entity is present and LINQ operators are composed #32823
  • Switch to managing projection/column aliases via ISqlAliasManager as well #32821
  • Compiled Query Issue #32820

Closed

  • Change T4-generated file name for scaffolded entities #32804
  • Migrations does not warn for unspecified decimals in ComplexProperty types #32827
  • ExecuteDeleteAsync fails when an owned entity exists and the query isn't supported natively (subquery form) #29690
  • Contains translates to correlated query when the item is nullable #32574
    8.0.x
  • GroupBy debug assert: Missing alias in the list: p1,p #26104
    Backlog
  • Clean table alias generation and generate unique aliases up-front #32784
  • Query contains non-consecutive table aliases when tables are pruned #32757
  • Set context_info in ef core #32814
  • what's different between use and not use await base.OnAfterRenderAsync #32808
  • Compiled Models in EF8 generates different SQL #32779
  • . #32822

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3mc from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32834
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32833
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix SelectExpression cloning when client projections are present #32824

Merged

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 and SQLitePCLRaw.core #32830
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 and SQLitePCLRaw.core #32829
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32832
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Redo SQL table alias management #32785

Updated

  • Use table mappings for FromSql #32816
  • Add back some methods to the compiled model that are used for customization #32805
  • Stop stripping new lines from migration script literals #32788

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Updated

  • Disable inner-clone in product source-build #18153
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Stabilize branding #18237
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #18236
